text: I try to post something every day mostly because I have no idea what my mail list software would do if one day there were nothing new on my blog. So here's the obligatory post that will help me not have to worry about this one more time. Reminds me of the time I got a letter from my Scottish penpal saying "sometimes my mother writes these letters for me." Never a more potent sentence. But this is really me, Dave -- coming to you late at night.
